name: Pencil Simulator
description:
Pencil Simulator is a simulator like most.U can be a pencil!! Move around as a pencil jumping flipping and messing around.Comes with a level editor and pencil editor that allows u to create your own pencil simulator eniviroments! Use custom objects to place objects inside of game, wanna build a bridge that can have death barrier in middle  u can! wanna  make custom pencil that looks like batman u can! wanna build a custom arcade with bouncy balls rockets and a trampoline u can! anything is possible with the first ever pencil simulator!!

Controls:

  • L key to launch rockets!
  • Arrow keys to move!
  • secret dev controls ;0 wait cant tell u those 
  • up arrow to perform a jump

Feedback is accepted i will continue development on this game!

Current game state: Released will recieve bug fixes and updates near future!
